name: microfocus_smax
label: Micro Focus SMAX
description: Micro Focus SMAX connector is used for fetch SMAX incidents, requests and automate different SMAX case management actions.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: server_url
fields.tooltip: Specify the URL of the SMAX server to connect and perform automated operations.
fields.description: Specify the URL of the SMAX server to connect and perform automated operations.

fields.title: Username
fields.name: username
fields.tooltip: Specify the Username used to access the SMAX server to connect and perform automated operations.
fields.description: Specify the Username used to access the SMAX server to connect and perform automated operations.

fields.title: Password
fields.name: password
fields.tooltip: Specify the Password used to access the SMAX server to connect and perform automated operations.
fields.description: Specify the Password used to access the SMAX server to connect and perform automated operations.

fields.title: Tenant ID
fields.name: tenant_id
fields.tooltip: Specify the Tenant ID used to access the SMAX server to connect and perform automated operations. The tenant ID is the number following TENANTID= in your management URL
fields.description: Specify the Tenant ID used to access the SMAX server to connect and perform automated operations. The tenant ID is the number following TENANTID= in your management URL

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.tooltip: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified. By default, this option is set to True.
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified. By default, this option is set to True.

parameters.title: Entities
parameters.name: entities
parameters.tooltip: Provide the list of entities for create new records.
parameters.description: Provide the list of entities for create new records.

parameters.title: Incident Name
parameters.name: incident_name
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name for new incident.
parameters.description: Specify the name for new incident.

parameters.title: Incident Description
parameters.name: incident_description
parameters.tooltip: Specify the description for new incident.
parameters.description: Specify the description for new incident.

parameters.title: Impacted Service ID
parameters.name: impacted_service_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify service ID of impacted service by incident.
parameters.description: Specify service ID of impacted service by incident.

parameters.title: Requested By User ID
parameters.name: requested_by_user_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the user ID who requested to create this incident.
parameters.description: Specify the user ID who requested to create this incident.

parameters.title: Incident Urgency
parameters.name: incident_urgency
parameters.tooltip: Specify the urgency level. Possible values are: NoDisruption, SlightDisruption, SevereDisruption, TotalLossOfService.
parameters.description: Specify the urgency level. Possible values are: NoDisruption, SlightDisruption, SevereDisruption, TotalLossOfService.

parameters.title: Impact Scope
parameters.name: impact_scope
parameters.tooltip: Specify the impact scope. Possible values are: SingleUser, MultipleUsers, SiteOrDepartment, Enterprise.
parameters.description: Specify the impact scope. Possible values are: SingleUser, MultipleUsers, SiteOrDepartment, Enterprise.

parameters.title: Service Desk Group ID
parameters.name: service_desk_group_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the group ID of service desk.
parameters.description: Specify the group ID of service desk.

parameters.title: Other Properities
parameters.name: other_properities
parameters.tooltip: Specify the other properties for new incident.
parameters.description: Specify the other properties for new incident.

parameters.title: Request Name
parameters.name: request_name
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name for new request.
parameters.description: Specify the name for new request.

parameters.title: Request Description
parameters.name: request_description
parameters.tooltip: Specify the description for new request.
parameters.description: Specify the description for new request.

parameters.title: Requested for User ID
parameters.name: requested_for_user_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the user ID to assign this request.
parameters.description: Specify the user ID to assign this request.

parameters.title: Requested By User ID
parameters.name: requested_by_user_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the user ID who requested to create this request.
parameters.description: Specify the user ID who requested to create this request.

parameters.title: Request Urgency
parameters.name: request_urgency
parameters.tooltip: Specify the urgency level. Possible values are: NoDisruption, SlightDisruption, SevereDisruption, TotalLossOfService.
parameters.description: Specify the urgency level. Possible values are: NoDisruption, SlightDisruption, SevereDisruption, TotalLossOfService.

parameters.title: Impact Scope
parameters.name: impact_scope
parameters.tooltip: Specify the impact scope. Possible values are: SingleUser, MultipleUsers, SiteOrDepartment, Enterprise.
parameters.description: Specify the impact scope. Possible values are: SingleUser, MultipleUsers, SiteOrDepartment, Enterprise.

parameters.title: Other Properities
parameters.name: other_properities
parameters.tooltip: Specify the other properties for new incident.
parameters.description: Specify the other properties for new incident.

parameters.title: Entity Type
parameters.name: entity_type
parameters.tooltip: Specify the type of entity. for example: "Incident", the type is case-sensitive.
parameters.description: Specify the type of entity. for example: "Incident", the type is case-sensitive.

parameters.title: Entity ID
parameters.name: entity_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of entity.
parameters.description: Specify the ID of entity.

parameters.title: Entity Fields
parameters.name: entity_fields
parameters.tooltip: Specify the fields of entity that you want to return. for example: "Priority,Category" for an entity of type "Incident".
parameters.description: Specify the fields of entity that you want to return. for example: "Priority,Category" for an entity of type "Incident".

parameters.title: Entity Type
parameters.name: entity_type
parameters.tooltip: Specify the type of entity. for example: "Incident", the type is case-sensitive.
parameters.description: Specify the type of entity. for example: "Incident", the type is case-sensitive.

parameters.title: Entity Fields
parameters.name: entity_fields
parameters.tooltip: Specify the fields of entity that you want to return. for example: "Priority,Category" for an entity of type "Incident".
parameters.description: Specify the fields of entity that you want to return. for example: "Priority,Category" for an entity of type "Incident".

parameters.title: Query Filter
parameters.name: query_filter
parameters.tooltip: Specify query for return list of entity. example: Status = 'Ready'" for Incident queries, see "REST API collection query protocol" in SMAX documentation to know how to use the filter.
parameters.description: Specify query for return list of entity. example: Status = 'Ready'" for Incident queries, see "REST API collection query protocol" in SMAX documentation to know how to use the filter.

parameters.title: Order By
parameters.name: order_by
parameters.tooltip: Specify the order on specific parameter. For example "Id desc"
parameters.description: Specify the order on specific parameter. For example "Id desc"

parameters.title: Size
parameters.name: size
parameters.tooltip: Specify the number of results which you need to return.
parameters.description: Specify the number of results which you need to return.

parameters.title: Skip
parameters.name: skip
parameters.tooltip: Specify how many resources should be skipped by specifying the starting index of the returned result.
parameters.description: Specify how many resources should be skipped by specifying the starting index of the returned result.

parameters.title: Entities
parameters.name: entities
parameters.tooltip: Provide the list of entities for update.
parameters.description: Provide the list of entities for update.

parameters.title: Incident ID

parameters.tooltip: Specify the incident ID for update incident.
parameters.description: Specify the incident ID for update incident.

parameters.description: Specify the description for update the incident.

parameters.title: Incident Closure Category ID

parameters.tooltip: Specify closure category ID for update incident.
parameters.description: Specify closure category ID for update incident.

parameters.title: Incident Completion Code

parameters.tooltip: Specify the incident completion code.
parameters.description: Specify the incident completion code.

parameters.description: Specify the incident solution details for update incident.

parameters.description: Specify the ID of request.

parameters.title: Request Status
parameters.name: request_status
parameters.tooltip: Specify the request status. Possible values are: RequestStatusReady, RequestStatusInProgress, RequestStatusPending, RequestStatusSuspended, RequestStatusComplete, RequestStatusPendingParent, RequestStatusRejected, RequestStatusPendingVendor, RequestStatusPendingExternalServiceDesk, RequestStatusPendingSpecialOperation.
parameters.description: Specify the request status. Possible values are: RequestStatusReady, RequestStatusInProgress, RequestStatusPending, RequestStatusSuspended, RequestStatusComplete, RequestStatusPendingParent, RequestStatusRejected, RequestStatusPendingVendor, RequestStatusPendingExternalServiceDesk, RequestStatusPendingSpecialOperation.
